notes.voice: Clear, professional US English voice — good for command responses
notes.sampleRate: Must match the model's native rate (22050 for most Piper models)
notes.speakingRate: 1.0 = normal. Range 0.5 (slow) to 2.0 (fast). Keep at 1.0 for clarity.
notes.sentenceSilence: Seconds of pause between sentences. 0.3 feels natural.
